colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, MCHED GROGS AI MA CHE BKA' BCU PA DANG NGAG DBANG BSTAN @010A *, ,'DZIN GNYIS GZHAN LA PHAN BSAM GYIS SOG YUL 'DI KAR ME LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANGS PA'I BKRA SHIS 'BYUNG 'JUG KYANG LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA BYIN RLABS SOGS MED PA'I YIG TSIG LDANG CAN GYI LUGS 'DZIN PA 'GA' SNANG MDO, RANG RE LA LHA BSKYED PA'I ME MCHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGO MCHOG PAR SBYIN BSREG GI THAB BSKYED DANG, SLOB DPON PADMA MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS CHEN PO'I GA-YANG 'GUG BYED KYI TSIG 'GA' ZHIG BSDUS NAS RAB BYAMS PA DANG BSOD NAMS KYI MDZAD PA'I STENG DU NYER SPYOD LNGA'I SPEL TSIG DANG BCAS LUG GI BRANG DANG MAR LU DANG CHANG MCHOD 'BUL SOGS NI, ,NOM CHE KO'U SHRI CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SO, ,'DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I NONGS PA CI MCHIS PA, BLA MA LHA LA BSHAGS SHING BZOD PAR GSOL, ,LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD MCHIS PA GANG THOB DGES, 'GRO BA RNAMS LA PHAN @010B PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
